featured.text: From (A) to (F) below, choose the ONES that are true for both jackdaws and turtle ants.

definition.zh_def: 指一個或一個以上的事物或人，通常用於表示數量或特定的個體。
definition.en_def: Refers to one or more items or individuals, typically used to indicate quantity or a specific entity.
definition.example: She has two ones and a five-dollar bill in her wallet.
